title: The Veterinarianâ€™s Wife, A Memoir
description: In this often funny, sometimes revealing, and always honest memoir, Susie Berta writes about her life over the past decades: her music, her art, and of course, her husband Rick, the veterinarian. She tells her story movingly and wittily as she muses on life, marriage, therapy, and horses, dogs, cows, pigs, and cats.
author: Susie Berta
